# ActivitiesController.DeleteActivity method

Deletes an existing activity.

```csharp
public Task<IActionResult> DeleteActivity(Guid id)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| id | The ID of the activity to be deleted. |

An IActionResult representing the result of the action.
